name: My Burning Heart
description:
Our protagonist, Adnan, gets sold as a slave and, instead of being sent to work in the fields, as he expected, he ends up in a Sultan’s harem… Although they try to trick him with good words and promises of being well fed and no physical punishments, he decides to comply with the Sultan’s orders… but only while he plans his escape from the palace.Features:
-50k words.

-Two romantic m/m routes, with a good and a bad ending each one.

-16 stunning CGs (most of them +18 rated).

-Detailed adult scenes.

-Free demo released for Yaoi Jam 2018.Team:
-Ertal, developer, writer and PR.

-6nii9, main artist.
